ARABIC: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ بَنَاتٍ وَأَصْفَىٰكُم بِٱلْبَنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Has He then taken daughters from what He has created and chosen sons for you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or has He taken from those He has created daughters for Himself, and assigned sons to you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Has Allah taken for Himself daughters out of those whom He creates and has chosen you to have sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Has God chosen some of His own creatures as daughters for Himself and has given you the preference of having sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Has He chosen daughters for Himself from His creation, and selected only sons for you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or has He taken daughters out of what He has created, and He has selected for you sons
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: What! has He taken daughters to Himself of what He Himself creates and chosen you to have sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or has He taken to Himself, from that He creates, daughters, and favoured you with sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or chooseth He daughters of all that He hath created, and honoureth He you with sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Has He then taken daughters out of His own creation and chosen sons for you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Hath He taken for Himself from whatsoever He hath created daughters, and hath honoured you with sons.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Did He adopt daughters from what He creates while He preferred you with sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: What! has He taken daughters out of what He himself creates, and granted to you sons for choice?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or has He taken daughters out of what He has created, and He has selected for you sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or, has He taken daughters from those He has created for Himself and favored sons for you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or has He chosen for Himself daughters from what He creates, and favored you with sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or has He taken, out of what He has created, daughters and chosen you for [having] sons?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:16] Or (am has the significance of the hamza of denial; the ‘saying’ is implied, in other words, a-taqūlūna, ‘[or] do you say that …’) He has adopted, from all that He has created, daughters, for Himself, and preferred you, privileged you, with sons? — that which is the necessary inference from what you claim and which by itself is an abomination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or chooseth He daughters of all that He hath created) i.e. of the angels, (and honours) and choose (He you) i.e. the Banu Malih (with sons?
